Class ReplyList

java.lang.Object
application.framework.BasePage
application.pages.ReplyList
public class ReplyList extends BasePage
Displays page with all replies of an answer. Supports nested replies and multiple users.
Author:
Mike

    • replyListViewSetup

      private javafx.scene.control.ListView<Answer> replyListViewSetup()
      Returns:

    • findAllAnswers

      private javafx.collections.ObservableList<Answer> findAllAnswers(Answer answer, javafx.collections.ObservableList<Answer> tempReplies)
      Parameters:
      answer - root answer to search from
      tempReplies - the list that is overwritten and replaced with the result
      Returns:
      A copy of the ObservableList filled, unsorted, with all answers descended from the root. Recursively traverses the list, finding all replies to a root answer. It will replace the passed ObservableList as well as return a copy for code formatting.

    • rearrangeAnswers

      private void rearrangeAnswers(javafx.collections.ObservableList<Answer> replies)
      Parameters:
      replies - The unsorted ObservableList of Answers Rearranges the Answers to properly format the replies to each Answer

    • resetSpacing

      private void resetSpacing()
      Resets the spacing to all Answers in the replies ObservableList
